title: IP Showing Wrong Amount
body: My ip keeps adding more than it  should. I reset the client and it goes back to normal but after a game it adds up to the wrong number. I cannot tell if I have enough IP for Leona or not. It shows i have 4,921 but I actually have less than 4800.

replies.body: Yes, but after i play a game it adds like an extra 120 something ip to the amount again.

This may be a syncing issue on the updated client.  Swap to the legacy client to get it updated, then switch back.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if that worked!
